channel.title: Pachinko on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Pachinko on My New Hugo Site

item.title: The Game Of Life
item.description: [big]There isn’t a better explanation for the current state of the American psyche than the impressive success of The Wall, which just had its season finale last night. It has a name that evokes a certain political football without ever actually referencing it. It counts perhaps the world’s most famous basketball player as an executive producer. It counts perhaps the busiest man in the world— the CEO of a freaking media empire—as its host.
